title: Collateral Approval Transfer Request File Schema
description: Collateral Approval Transfer Request File Schema

collateralTransferIdentification.description: Provides details about unique transaction identification known by the participant

clearingMemberOriginIdentificationId.description: Origin clearing member identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

clearingMemberOriginIdentificationCatego.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode

partyOriginIdentificationId.description: Origin participant identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

partyOriginIdentificationCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode

accountOriginIdentificationId.description: Origin account identifier defined by the participant

clearingMemberDestinationIdentificationI.description: Destination clearing member identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

clearingMemberDestinationIdentificationC.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode

partyDestinationIdentificationId.description: Destination participant identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

partyDestinationIdentificationCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode

accountDestinationIdentificationId.description: Destination account identifier defined by the participant

positionTransferReference.description: The field PositionTransferReference is used to identify a position transfer

securitiesCollateralIdentification.description: Securities collateral identification as known by party

securitiesAssetNumber.description: Identifies the register number of the securities collateral deposit

securitiesQuantity.description: Quantity requested to securities collateral transfer

securitiesCustodianParticipantId.description: Securities custodian participant identifier provided by A5X

securitiesCentralDepositaryOperationNumb.description: Central Depository Operation Number for securities

securitiesCollateralValueAmount.description: Securities collateral accepted value amount after taking into account the haircut

securitiesCollateralValueCurrency.description: Currency code for securities collateral value
securitiesCollateralValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

cashCollateralIdentification.description: Cash collateral identification as known by party

cashAssetNumber.description: Identifies the register number of the cash collateral deposit

cashOperationValueAmount.description: Amount requested to cash collateral transfer

cashOperationValueCurrency.description: Currency code for cash operation value

cashCollateralValueAmount.description: Cash collateral accepted value amount after taking into account the haircut

cashCollateralValueCurrency.description: Currency code for cash collateral value

federalBondsCollateralIdentification.description: Federal bonds collateral ID given by the requestor participant

federalBondsAssetNumber.description: Identifies the register number of the federal bonds collateral deposit

federalBondsAssignerAccount.description: Provides assigner account identification for federal bonds

federalBondsAssigneeAccount.description: Provides the assignee account identification for federal bonds

federalBondsQuantity.description: Quantity requested to federal bonds collateral transfer

federalBondsCollateralValueAmount.description: Federal bonds collateral accepted value amount after taking into account the haircut

federalBondsCollateralValueCurrency.description: Currency code for federal bonds collateral value
federalBondsCollateralValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

externalSecuritiesCollateralIdentificati.description: External securities collateral identification as known by party

externalSecuritiesAssetNumber.description: Identifies the register number of the external securities collateral deposit

externalSecuritiesQuantity.description: Quantity requested to external securities collateral transfer

externalSecuritiesCollateralValueAmount.description: External securities collateral accepted value amount after taking into account the haircut

externalSecuritiesCollateralValueCurrenc.description: Currency code for external securities collateral value
externalSecuritiesCollateralValueCurrenc.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode
